# VisualShaderNodeTransformDecompose

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](class_visualshadernode.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Decomposes a [Transform3D](class_transform3d.md) into four [Vector3](class_vector3.md)\ s within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Takes a 4Ã—4 transform matrix and decomposes it into four ``vec3`` values, one from each row of the matrix.
